snippet.title: My Hero One's Justice 2 - Release Date Trailer - PS4/XB1/PC/Switch
snippet.description:
For all heroes out there, My Hero One's Justice 2 launches on March 13, 2020!
Play quirky battles with the newly confirmed characters: Sir Nighteye, Fat Gum, Twice and Mr Compress!


Pre-order now: http://bnent.eu/MHOJ2_Collector



 #MyHero #OnesJustice #BandaiNamco


Follow us on:
Web: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcoeu/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
